result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) was dismissed by the court.

  • Kou Yang was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 10:44am
INCLUDES 14CF10 & 15CF712
State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher.  Defendant appears in person, in custody, with Atty Amanda Ley
Date and time set for SAR in 14CF10 & plea in 15CF712

SAR 14CF10:
State will proceed with SAR in 14CF10 Ct. 1 OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs)
COURT has received SAR packet and will follow SAR packet guidelines for sentencing

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 
State moves to:
15CF712:
Ct. 2 Operating while revoked (rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal) >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA: 
15CF712:
Ct. 1 OWI (5th) >> GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 14CF10 Ct. 1- 1 year MCJ, consecutive to 15CF712 Ct. 1. Credit granted for 310 days against 1 year. Financial obligations outstanding to be paid as condition of probation. 15CF712 Ct. 1- I/S- 6 years WSPS: 3 years IC, 3 years ES. Probation for 3 years. CONDITIONS: Complete Marathon County OWI Court and abide by all rules of programming. Pay $3,214 fine inclusive of all costs. Serve 1 year conditional jail, consecutuve to 14CF10 Ct. 1. Stay 90 days jail for rule violations. Credit granted for 220 days against 9 months conditional time. 3 years driver's license revocation, administrative credit granted for any time already served. 3 years IID to be installed immediately, time will not begin until deft obtain's valid license. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Pay $165 AODA fee. 6 points against driving record. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. Deft is eligible for both prison programming- Challenge Incarceration & Substance Abuse if revoked. 

Adj: 11:09am
Plea hearing on March 22, 2016 at 10:45 am.
Sentencing hearing on revocation at 01-04-2016 04:00 pm
Assessment bill ($165.00) North Central Health Care

Clerk Shirley
Case Called: 2:56
Includes: 13CM23 and 14CF10
Time set for a plea, sentencing and SAR
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo.  Def appears with Atty Pauline Toulouse.
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW
State moves to: 14CF10>>Count 2>>Dismissed
Count 3 and Count 4>>DRI
Court grants.
PLEA: 14CF10>>OWI 4th>>No Contest.
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. Court has reviewed SAR packet.
COURT ORDERS: 14CF10>>WS and placed on Probation for 3 years with Conditions of: 1 year conditional MCJ w/Huber for work concurrent to 13CM23, Fine of $1000.00 + CC, 36 months DLR, 36 months IID (qualifies for 1/2 price), assessment, counseling and treatment deemed appropriate by agent, Driving with Care Program, AODA, 6 pts. and has 35 days credit and can be used on the conditional time.
13CM23>>OWI 3rd>>9 months MCJ w/huber for work concurrent ot 14CF10 and has 54 days credit. Court signs 1/2 price IID form, DNA surcharge.
